content:
Greeting,
My name is Khiêm (Kenvin). I’m a software developer, from Ninh Hiệp village, Vietnam.
My bio includes computer programming, art, game and music.
My favorite answers for the really-worth-asking question “Why are we here?”
 I don’t know why we are here, but I’m pretty sure it’s NOT in order to enjoy ourselves.
 Ludwig Wittgenstein    We are here on Earth to help others. What the others are here for, I’ve NO idea.
 W.H. Auden
title: About
